name: Verse of the Day Widget for WP
author: Allen Floyd

sections.description:
The Verse of the Day Widget for WP plugin displays a daily Bible verse with a beautiful nature image above it. This plugin is designed to provide daily spiritual inspiration and visual beauty to your website visitors. Each day, a new verse from the King James Version (KJV) of the Bible is randomly selected and displayed, overlaid on a carefully curated nature image that’s in Google’s WebP image format.

Features:

  • Daily Verses: Automatically updates daily with a new Bible verse.
  • Nature Photos: Each verse is displayed over a high-quality nature image, enhancing visual appeal.
  • Shortcode Support: Easily add the widget to any post or page using the shortcode [votd_verse_of_the_day_widget_for_wp].
  • Widget Customization: The widget is fully editable under the “Widgets” section in the WordPress Appearance tab.
  • Flexible Placement: The widget can be placed in the left and right sidebars as well as in the header area.

How to Use:

  1. Installation: Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/verse-of-the-day-widget-for-wp directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activation: Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Customization: You can edit the widget in the “Appearance” tab under “Widgets” in the WordPress dashboard. It can be added to the left or right sidebar, or even the header area.
  4. Shortcode: Use the shortcode [votd_verse_of_the_day_widget_for_wp] to display the widget on any post or page.

Frequently Asked Questions:

How do I display the widget?
Use the shortcode [votd_verse_of_the_day_widget_for_wp] in your posts or pages.

Is the plugin compatible with all themes?
The plugin is designed to be compatible with most WordPress themes. If you encounter any issues, please contact support at allenfloyd@freesmartphoneapps.com

Screenshots:

  1. Screenshot of the widget left and right sidebar placement on a mobile device
  2. Screenshot of widget header placement on a desktop computer
  3. Screenshot of the settings page in the WordPress admin panel

Changelog:

6.1

  • This widget is now formatted to fit both the header and the left and right sidebar widget areas.

6.0

  • The Verse of the Day Widget for WP now appears in the list of available widgets.

5.0

  • The widget now maintains a consistent size across both posts and pages.

4.0

  • this plugin now uses a 3rd Party API from freesmartphoneapps.com called VerseOfTheDayWidgetForWP

3.0

  • updated top 10 KJV Bible verses searched according to Google

2.9

  • removed all instances of .png images and decided to use .webp for all backgrounds

2.7

  • Got everything running smoothly with this new plugin and added another image

2.0

  • Made all necessary corrections based on the plugin review.

1.0

  • Initial release.

Third-Party Service

This plugin relies on the VerseOfTheDayWidgetForWP API to retrieve random Bible verses (KJV) for display. The API does not collect or store personal data. The API is accessed from the following URL: https://www.freesmartphoneapps.com/verseoftheday/api/.

Please refer to the API’s privacy policy here: https://freesmartphoneapps.com/privacy-policy-votd/
